content: materials double knitting yarn in two contrasting colours one darker and one lighter us size 3 or 3 25mm straight needles handful of polyester fiberfill stuffing tapestry needle gauge 7 sts and 10 row =1 in stockinette stitch finished size approximately 3 5 inches in diameter to knit ball note this pattern is knitted with short row shaping each yarn forward and turn work creates a loop of yarn under the stitch when knitting back over a stitch with a loop under it the loop must be knitted into at the same time as the stitch above it please see photos 1 and 2 for how this looks or there s a full explanation of how to do this in this blog post http //nattyknitter wordpress com/2009/07/25/advanced-short-row-shaping-how-to-close-the- holes/ using darker colour yarn co 23 sts
